resources.string: User can search for music to purchase. I should apply intent INTENT_ACTION_MEDIA_SEARCH. Pay now button should launch PaymentActivity. I should integrate Paypal android SDK (downloadable) and PayPal Wallet App.
Shows details of all playlist on the device. I should apply class ContentResolver to retrieve playlists, intent Audio.Playlists.ENTRY_CONTENT_TYPE to play a playlist.
Shows list of songs (with details) stored on the device. I should apply class ContentResolver to retrieve tracks, intent ACTION_VIEW Data URI Scheme and "audio/*" to play it.

User can play music from the database of the device. Skip song or go back to previous one, mark favorite, and shuffle playlist. To play music I should use MediaPlayer and AudioManager/MediaController Classes.
